publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3592 Shirley-Anne Somerville: Eco-driving Challenge—That the Parliament welcomes the Energy Saving Trusts’ Eco-driving initiative; notes that the three-year-long campaign aims to inform drivers of more economical driving techniques that result in energy savings and reduced fuel consumption; recognises the benefit of taking small steps to save energy in our everyday lives in addition to cutting fuel costs and promoting safer driving, and encourages people to take their own virtual eco-drive at www.energysavingtrust.org.uk/scotland.
S3M-3592 Eco-driving Challenge (lodged on 3 March 2009) Hugh Henry*
